#define UIOMUX_NONE   0
 Specifies that no resources are selected.

 Specifies that all resources are selected.

Detailed Description

UIOMux resource type.

IP blocks are accessed by symbolic name. This file includes architecture-specific resource names.

Typedef Documentation

typedef int uiomux_resource_t

A mask of multiple resources.

A UIOMux handle corresponds to a set of blocks atomically allocated together.
